message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $110. I think it would be very valuable to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $100. Please let me know if this is possible.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $100 is a bit too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $105?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still can't go above $100. Would $95 be within your range?
